Hundreds of thousands of additional child deaths due to Social Isolation

Hundreds of thousands of additional child deaths due to Social Isolationontrols (SICs) {#h.9u3qvhko1ee9 .zfr3Q .JYVBee dir=”ltr” style=”text-align: center;”}

Hundreds of thousands of additional child deaths due to Social Isolation Controls (SICs)

https://lnkd.in/gKhpjyh

Noted this para on p 9:

“In contrast to the direct impact of COVID-19, the broader effects of the pandemic on child health are significant. Reduced household income will force poor families to cut back on essential health and food expenditures. Drawing again on the forecast for global economic growth from the IMF and the historical relationship between GDP growth and infant mortality in the developing world15 , hundreds of thousands of additional child deaths could occur in 2020 compared to a pre-pandemic counterfactual scenario. This would effectively reverse the last 2 to 3 years of progress in reducing infant mortality within a single year.”
